text: Bryan Antonio García Sirias (born 25 May 1995) is a Nicaraguan professional footballer who plays as a winger for the Real Estelí F.C.. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Nicaragua's goal tally first. {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- !Goal!!Date!!Venue!!Opponent!!Score!!Result!!Competition |- | 1. || 11 December 2015 || Estadio Independencia, Estelí, Nicaragua || || align=center | 1–0 || align=center | 1–0 || Friendly |- | 2. || 15 January 2017 || rowspan="2" | Estadio Rommel Fernández, Panama City, Panama || || align=center | 1–2 || align=center | 1–2 || rowspan="2" | 2017 Copa Centroamericana |- | 3. || 20 January 2017 || || align=center | 3–1 || align=center | 3–1 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Nicaraguan footballers Category:Real Estelí F.C. players Category:Managua F.C. players Category:2017 Copa Centroamericana players Category:2017 CONCACAF Gold Cup players Category:Nicaragua international footballers
title: Bryan García (Nicaraguan footballer)
